description: Enterprise techniques used by SNUGRIDE, ATT&CK software S0159 v1.0
name: SNUGRIDE (S0159)

techniques.comment: SNUGRIDE is capable of executing commands and spawning a reverse shell.
SNUGRIDE establishes persistence through a Registry Run key.
SNUGRIDE communicates with its C2 server over HTTP.
SNUGRIDE encrypts C2 traffic using AES with a static key.
